name: MERR 90
title: Theory and Practice of Field Study
description: Course provides an opportunity for lower-division students to learn about Santa Cruz, Calif., its contemporary history, culture, and politics through classroom theoretical learning integrated with individual field studies. Course also examines social change, qualitative research, and community organizing.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to College Scholar Students.

class_notes: This Fall, MERR 90-01 is open to ALL students
